overview: Originating in the United Kingdom and first airing on the Disney Channel, this motivational series is designed to assist youngsters in developing independence and self-esteem through fun character-building exercises. Children will enjoy learning from various animal friends, with narration from actor Nigel Hawthorne. This specific set focuses on imparting to children much-needed confidence that will help them with each stage of growing up
title: Animal Stories: Confident Creatures
